comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: I'm suspecting this is a propaganda photograph?

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: It definitely shows a scene from a peaceful and friendly occupation.  I think almost all of the Bain war photos are propaganda, depending on which side the audience for the photo was rooting.

comment.author: 48889055628@N01
comment._content: I wonder if the guy on the bike is making some sort of rude gesture (early photo bomb). The only thing I can think of is the "biting the thumb" gesture that means screw you. He looks too intently at the camera not to be in some way making his own comment on the scene.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: looking at the hi-res version, it seems he has a pipe in his mouth.
